item.title: City and Guilds 7s German tour a success
item.author: Toby Spittle,
item.description: This tour had it all; no sleep, local delicacies, someone getting lost, British weather – and some great rugby. Whilst this describes the tour to leave it at that would not do it justice. C&G RFC celebrated the end of the season with a 4-day tour to Berlin where they participated in the 2nd …
